Hi! My name is Alden Cutler, and I'm currently a student at Worcester Polytechnic Institute in Massaschusetts, but when I'm not at school I live in Seattle, WA. I'm interested in internship opportunities for the Summer 2023 period while I'm home in Seattle.

Experience

Cybersecurity Intern

The Boeing Company

Improve cyber event detection and response of the on-board computer system.

This experience was for my high school's capstone project. I worked with Boeing's cybersecurity team during the last two months of my senior year to develop a new technology focused on detecting cyber events to be soon implemented on the aircraft.

Interests

Apart from being a college student, I like to spend time outdoors. I play soccer throughout the year, and in the winter, I love to ski. I also like listening to music, generally early 2000s Indie Pop or Rock, but I also enjoy grunge and pop.

When indoors, I like to play video games with friends, read sci-fi, fantasy, or thriller books, cook, and teach myself chess.

This is currently my favorite song. I'll occasionally update it whenever I remember to.
